# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia

function wrap_string(text::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(text)
    wrapped_text = ""
    line_width = 0
    for word in words
        if line_width + length(word) > text_width
            wrapped_text = ltrim(wrapped_text) * "\n" * word
            line_width = length(word)
        else
            wrapped_text = ltrim(wrapped_text) * " " * word
            line_width = line_width + length(word)
        end
    end
    return wrapped_text
end

```
